films.title: Interestelar
films.storyline: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival

films.title: Inception (A Origem)
films.storyline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO

films.title: Jobs
films.storyline: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

films.title: The Salt of the Earth (O Sal da Terra)
films.storyline: Brazilian photographer Sebastião Salgado travels 40 years across the continents in the footsteps of a humanity always changing. The film portrays this story. A tribute to the beauty of the planet

films.title: The Pursuit of Happyness (À Procura da Felicidade)
films.storyline: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

films.title: Blindness (Ensaio sobre a Cegueira)
films.storyline: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant white blindness. Film based on the book of the author José Saramago

films.title: Sobral: O Homem que não tinha Preço
films.storyline: Documentário sobre a história da vida de um dos mais emblemáticos advogados brasileiros Sobral Pinto
